title: Unearthed Trail of Ibn Battuta Episode 1 GE-SteamWorks
description:
:::::::: SteamWorks PRESENTS ::::::::


:::: Unearthed Trail of Ibn Battuta Episode 1 GE-SteamWorks ::::


::Information::


Released : January 4, 2014
Genre: Action / Adventure
Developer: Semaphore
Publisher: Semanoor
Platform: PC
Publication Type: pirates
Language: Russian / English / MULTi16
Language: English / Arabosky / Italian
Tablet: enclosing [SKiDROW emu]


::Description::


Unearthed: Trail of Ibn Battuta is an action adventure third-person. The game 
takes place today in the Middle East. The protagonist Faris Jawad (Faris Jawad) 
goes to Morocco in the footsteps of the famous Muslim explorer Ibn Battuta (Ibn Battuta).


::System Requirements::


OS: Windows 7 or 8 
Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core processor 
Memory: 4 GB RAM 
Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 
DirectX: Version 9.0c 
Hard Drive: 9 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX Compatible


::Installation Steps::


1) Download the torrent.

2) Copy the contents of the distribution to any location on your hard drive

3) Play


::Greetz and Respect::


ALL CREDIT Goes to Deadmau5 for Ripping and Special friend for Distribution.
